abstract: Israeli ministerial committee approves bill that permits retroactive legalization of Jewish settlement outposts built on privately owned Palestinian land located in occupied West Bank; experts say bill, which requires approval by Parliament, would defy international law.
lead_paragraph: If approved by Parliament, legislation would transfer the rights for the use of private land into Israeli hands and force Palestinian landowners to accept compensation.
snippet: If approved by Parliament, legislation would transfer the rights for the use of private land into Israeli hands and force Palestinian landowners to accept compensation....

headline.main: Bill to Legalize West Bank Settlements Advances in Israel
headline.print_headline: Israeli Bill to Legalize Settlements Advances
